trans-unit.source: Provides a utility class for the creation and verification of digital signatures in a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe de utilitário para a criação e a verificação de assinaturas digitais em um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: PackageDigitalSignatureManager builds on the architecture of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] digital signature classes and provides a utility class for performing common tasks in using digital signatures with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elements.
trans-unit.target: PackageDigitalSignatureManager se baseia na arquitetura de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] assinatura digital classes e fornece uma classe de utilitário para executar tarefas comuns usando assinaturas digitais com <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>elementos.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais de pacote, consulte o artigo do MSDN estrutura de assinaturas digitais das Open Packaging Conventions disponíveis em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager"> </xref> classe para uso com um especificado <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The target package associated with the signature manager is set during initialization.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de destino associado ao Gerenciador de assinatura é definido durante a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: After it is set, the package associated with the signature manager cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Depois de configurado, o pacote associado com o Gerenciador de assinatura não pode ser alterado.

trans-unit.source: Create a new signature manager for each package as needed.
trans-unit.target: Crie uma nova assinatura Gerenciador para cada pacote conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: The package associated with this signature manager.
trans-unit.target: O pacote associado a este Gerenciador de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X.509 certificate embedding option used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign*> method to digitally sign package parts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o certificado x.&509; inserindo opção usada pelo <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign*>método para assinar digitalmente as partes do pacote.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies where the signer's X.509 certificate will be stored when digitally signing a part.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica onde o certificado do assinante x.&509; será armazenado quando a assinatura digital de uma parte.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Countersigns all the signatures in the package with a user-selected X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Countersigns todas as assinaturas no pacote com um certificado x.&509; selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: If no X.509 certificate is specified in the call, this method opens a certificate selection dialog box that prompts the user to choose a certificate to use for signing.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum certificado x.&509; é especificado na chamada, este método abre uma caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado que solicita ao usuário para escolher um certificado a ser usado para assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Set the window handle in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A> property before calling Countersign to make the Certificate Selection Dialog modal to the given window.
trans-unit.target: Definir o identificador de janela no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A>propriedade antes de chamar referenda para tornar a caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado para determinada janela modal.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The signature that was added as a countersign; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no certificate could be located or the user canceled the certificate selection dialog.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura que foi adicionada como uma referenda; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum certificado foi localizado ou o usuário cancelou a caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado.

trans-unit.source: Countersigns all the signatures in the package with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Countersigns todas as assinaturas no pacote com um certificado x.&509; especificado.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to add as a countersign signature.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para adicionar como uma assinatura referenda.

trans-unit.source: The signature that was added as a countersign.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura que foi adicionada como uma referenda.

trans-unit.source: certificate is
trans-unit.target: certificateé

trans-unit.source: Countersigns a list of signatures with a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Countersigns uma lista de assinaturas com um determinado certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to countersign each of the specified `signatures`.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para referendar cada especificado `signatures`.

trans-unit.source: The list of signatures to countersign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de assinaturas para referendar.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to countersign each of the signatures.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para referendar cada o signatures .

trans-unit.source: Either the certificate or signatures parameter is .
trans-unit.target: Either the certificate or signatures parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The package contains no signed <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: O pacote não contém nenhuma assinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The package contains no <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"></xref> parts.
trans-unit.target: O pacote não contém nenhuma <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"> </xref> partes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] cadeia de caracteres que identifica o algoritmo de hash padrão usado para criar e verificar as assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: The default hash algorithm for the standard <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url> ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de hash padrão para o padrão <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager>classe é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url>([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_sha1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A> property gets or sets the actual hash algorithm this is used to create and verify signatures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>propriedade obtém ou define o algoritmo de hash real, isso é usado para criar e verificar assinaturas.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DefaultHashAlgorithm property is typically used to reset the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A> property back to default after a temporary change.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DefaultHashAlgorithm normalmente é usada para reiniciar o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>propriedade padrão após uma alteração temporária.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the default hash algorithm used to create and verify signatures.
trans-unit.target: Um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] cadeia de caracteres que identifica o algoritmo de hash padrão usado para criar e verificar as assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: Returns the digital signature for a given signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Retorna a assinatura digital para uma determinada assinatura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the digital signature to return.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da assinatura digital para retornar.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified signatureUri, or if a signature for the given signatureUri cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital especificado signatureUri , ou se uma assinatura para o determinado signatureUri não pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identifier for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> instance used to create and verify signatures.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identificador para o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref> instância usada para criar e verificar as assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: The default hash algorithm identifier for the standard digital signature manager is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url> (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>—Secure Hash Algorithm version 1.0).
trans-unit.target: O identificador de algoritmo de hash padrão para o Gerenciador de assinatura digital padrão é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url>(<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>— Secure Hash Algorithm versão 1.0).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigSHA1Url>

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly set otherwise, this property gets the same value as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que explicitamente, caso contrário, defina essa propriedade é o mesmo valor como <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HashAlgorithm property is typically not changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HashAlgorithm normalmente não é alterada do padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property must be changed only if a signature that uses a different known and accessible <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm> is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade deve ser alterada somente se uma assinatura que usa um conhecido diferente e acessível <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>for encontrado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: When finished with the signature that uses a different hash algorithm, call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A> to reset the HashAlgorithm property back to default.
trans-unit.target: Quando terminar com a assinatura que usa um algoritmo de hash diferente, chamar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A>para redefinir a propriedade HashAlgorithm padrão.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.DefaultHashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identifier for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> instance used to create and verify signatures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] identificador para o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref> instância usada para criar e verificar as assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: The string for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] definir é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to set is empty.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] definido está vazio.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures*> encounters an invalid signature.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures*>encontra uma assinatura inválida.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package contains any signatures.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote contém assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: The IsSigned property does not perform signature validations.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsSigned não executar validações de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: If signatures are present and IsSigned is `true`, one or more of the signatures might not be valid.
trans-unit.target: Se houver assinaturas e IsSigned for `true`, um ou mais assinaturas podem não ser válido.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures%2A> to confirm that the signatures are valid and have not changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures%2A>para confirmar que as assinaturas são válidas e não foram alterados.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package contains signatures; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pacote contiver assinaturas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a handle to the parent window for displaying a certificate selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um identificador para a janela pai para exibir uma caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado.

trans-unit.source: A certificate selection dialog box is presented only if a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> call contains no certificates.
trans-unit.target: Uma caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado é exibida somente se um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>chamada não contém certificados.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no certificates are specified, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> will display a certificate selection dialog box that enables the user to choose which certificate to use for signing.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum certificado for especificado, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>exibirá uma caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado que permite ao usuário escolher qual certificado usar para assinar.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The handle of the parent window to use to display the certificate selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da janela pai a ser usado para exibir a caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all digital signatures from the package.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as assinaturas digitais do pacote.

trans-unit.source: This method also removes all X.509 certificates from the package.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também remove todos os certificados x.&509; do pacote.

trans-unit.source: After removing all signatures and certificates, call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A> to persist all changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: Depois de remover todas as assinaturas e certificados, chame <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>para manter todas as alterações ao repositório.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes the digital signature with a given signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Remove a assinatura digital com uma determinada assinatura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method also removes the associated X.509 certificate if it is not referenced by any other digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também remove o certificado x.&509; associado, se ele não é referenciado por qualquer outra assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: After removing a signature, call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A> to persist the change to the store.
trans-unit.target: Depois de remover uma assinatura, chame <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>para manter a alteração para o repositório.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Prompts the user for an X.509 certificate, which is then used to digitally sign a specified list of package parts.
trans-unit.target: Solicita ao usuário um certificado x.&509;, que é usado para assinar digitalmente uma lista especificada de partes do pacote.

trans-unit.source: To make the certificate selection dialog modal to a particular window, set the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A> property before calling Sign.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer com que a caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado para uma determinada janela modal, defina o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A>propriedade antes de chamar o sinal.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.ParentWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sign will not prompt for certificates if there are none in the default certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Entrada não solicitará certificados se não houver nenhum no repositório de certificados padrão.

trans-unit.source: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> elements to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> elementos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to sign the list of parts.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para assinar a lista de parts .

trans-unit.source: Signs a list of package parts with a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma lista de partes do pacote com um determinado certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> elements to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> elementos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified `parts`.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; a ser usado para assinar digitalmente cada especificado `parts`.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to sign the given list of parts; or if no certificate could be found or the user clicked "Cancel" in the certificate selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para assinar a lista fornecida de parts ; ou se nenhum certificado foi encontrado ou o usuário clicou em "Cancelar" na caixa de diálogo de seleção de certificado.

trans-unit.source: Signs a list of package parts and package relationships with a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma lista de partes do pacote e relações do pacote com um determinado certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: Between `parts` and `relationshipSelectors` there must be at least one element to sign.
trans-unit.target: Entre `parts` e `relationshipSelectors` deve haver pelo menos um elemento para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; a ser usado para assinar digitalmente cada uma das partes especificadas e relações.

trans-unit.source: The list of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the parts and relationshipSelectors lists.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para assinar os elementos especificados no parts e relationshipSelectors lista.

trans-unit.source: Neither parts nor relationshipSelectors specify any objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: Nem parts nem relationshipSelectors especificar todos os objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: Signs a list of package parts and package relationships with a given X.509 certificate and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Faz uma lista de partes do pacote e relações do pacote com um determinado certificado x.&509; e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The `parts` list can be empty or `null` if `relationshipSelectors` contains at least one entry.
trans-unit.target: O `parts` lista pode estar vazia ou `null` se `relationshipSelectors` contém pelo menos uma entrada.

trans-unit.source: The `relationshipSelectors` list can be empty or `null` if `parts` contains at least one entry.
trans-unit.target: O `relationshipSelectors` lista pode estar vazia ou `null` se `parts` contém pelo menos uma entrada.

trans-unit.source: Between the `parts` list and `relationshipSelectors` there must be at least one element to sign.
trans-unit.target: Entre o `parts` lista e `relationshipSelectors` deve haver pelo menos um elemento para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; a ser usado para assinar digitalmente cada uma das partes especificadas e relações.

trans-unit.source: The list of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: An identification string to associate with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de identificação para associar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the parts and relationshipSelectors lists.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para assinar os elementos especificados no parts e relationshipSelectors lista.

trans-unit.source: Neither parts nor relationshipSelectors specify any elements to sign.
trans-unit.target: Nem parts nem relationshipSelectors especificar quaisquer elementos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: Signs a list of package parts, package relationships, or custom objects with a specified X.509 certificate and signature [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Faz uma lista de partes do pacote, as relações de pacote ou objetos personalizados com um certificado x.&509; especificado e a assinatura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: There must be at least one element to sign in `parts`, `relationshipSelectors`, `signatureObjects`, or `objectReferences`.
trans-unit.target: Deve haver pelo menos um elemento entrar `parts`, `relationshipSelectors`, `signatureObjects`, ou `objectReferences`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The terms `Object`, `Manifest`, `Reference`, `SignatureProperties`, and `Transform` in the following two remarks refer to element types and tags defined by the W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing specification, see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Os termos `Object`, `Manifest`, `Reference`, `SignatureProperties`, e `Transform` no exemplo a seguir dois comentários Consulte tipos de elemento e marcas definidas pela especificação de processamento e a sintaxe de assinatura XML da W3C, consulte [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).

trans-unit.source: This and other <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method overloads use the current <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TransformMapping%2A> dictionary that defines a `Transform` to apply based on the package part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este e outros <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>sobrecargas do método usam atual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TransformMapping%2A>dicionário que define uma `Transform` para aplicar com base na parte do pacote <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TransformMapping%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification currently allows only two valid `Transform` algorithms: C14 and C14N.
trans-unit.target: A especificação de Microsoft Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) atualmente permite apenas duas válido `Transform` algoritmos: C14 e C14N.

trans-unit.source: The W3C XML-Signature Syntax and Processing standard does not allow empty `Manifest` tags.
trans-unit.target: O padrão de processamento e a sintaxe de assinatura XML da W3C não permite vazio `Manifest` marcas.

trans-unit.source: Also the Open Packaging Conventions specification requires a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>-specific `Object` tag that contains both `Manifest` and `SignatureProperties` tags.
trans-unit.target: Também requer a especificação Open Packaging Conventions um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>-específico `Object` marca que contém ambos `Manifest` e `SignatureProperties` marcas.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: Each `Manifest` tag additionally also include at least one `Reference` tag.
trans-unit.target: Cada `Manifest` marca adicionalmente também incluir pelo menos um `Reference` marca.

trans-unit.source: These tags require that each signature sign at least one <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> (non-empty parts tag) or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> (non-empty `relationshipSelectors`) even if the signature is needed only to sign `signatureObjects` or `objectReferences`.
trans-unit.target: Essas marcas requerem que cada assinatura assinar pelo menos um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>(marca de partes não vazias) ou <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>(não-vazia `relationshipSelectors`) mesmo que a assinatura é necessária somente para assinar `signatureObjects` ou `objectReferences`.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: This Sign method ignores the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A> property associated with each <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> defined in `objectReferences`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de entrada ignora o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A>propriedade associada a cada <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>definidos no `objectReferences`.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: This Sign overload provides support for generation of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] signatures that require custom `Object` tags.
trans-unit.target: Essa sobrecarga de entrada oferece suporte para a geração de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] assinaturas que exigem personalizado `Object` marcas.

trans-unit.source: For any provided `Object` tag to be signed, a corresponding `Reference` tag must be provided with a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the `Object` tag in local fragment syntax.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer fornecido `Object` marca a ser assinada, correspondente `Reference` deve ser fornecido com uma [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] que especifica o `Object` marca na sintaxe de fragmento local.

trans-unit.source: For example if the `Object` tag has an ID of "myObject", the URI in the `Reference` tag would be "#myObject".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo se o `Object` marca tem uma ID de "myObject", o URI no `Reference` marca seria "#myObject".

trans-unit.source: For unsigned objects, no `Reference` is required.
trans-unit.target: Para não assinado objetos, não `Reference` é necessária.

trans-unit.source: The list of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use to digitally sign each of the specified parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; a ser usado para assinar digitalmente cada uma das partes especificadas e relações.

trans-unit.source: The list of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> objetos para entrar.

trans-unit.source: An identification string to associate with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de identificação para associar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: A list of custom data objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de objetos de dados personalizados para entrar.

trans-unit.source: A list of references to custom objects to sign.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de referências a objetos personalizados para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature used to sign the elements specified in the parts and relationshipSelectors lists.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital usada para assinar os elementos especificados no parts e relationshipSelectors lista.

trans-unit.source: Neither parts, relationshipSelectors, signatureObjects, nor objectReferences specify any elements to sign.
trans-unit.target: Neither parts, relationshipSelectors, signatureObjects, nor objectReferences specify any elements to sign.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType*> of a part being signed references an empty, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, or undefined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TransformMapping*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <> </> *> de uma parte que está sendo assinadas referências vazio, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, ou indefinido <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: signatureId is not and is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] schema ID (for example, begins with a leading numeric digit).
trans-unit.target: signatureIdnão é e não é válido [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] ID de esquema (por exemplo, começa com um dígito numérico à esquerda).

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the signature origin part.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] da parte de origem de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The SignatureOrigin [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] can vary by package because the name is not formally defined.
trans-unit.target: O SignatureOrigin [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] pode variar por pacote porque o nome não foi definido anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: While this implementation will generally use the same default value, the value returned by this property will reflect whatever origin is already present in the current <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Embora essa implementação geralmente usarão o mesmo valor padrão, o valor retornado por essa propriedade refletirá qualquer origem já está presente no atual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the signature origin part.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da parte de origem de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of default signature origin relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de relação de origem de assinatura padrão.

trans-unit.source: The type of default signature origin relationship.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de relação de origem de assinatura padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the signatures contained in the package.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de todas as assinaturas contidas no pacote.

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de todos os <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date/time format used to create a signature <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato de data/hora usado para criar uma assinatura <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: The default TimeFormat is "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD".
trans-unit.target: O TimeFormat padrão é "Aaaa-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD".

trans-unit.source: Date/time formats follow the syntax of the "W3C Date and Time Formats" specification at [http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html](http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html).
trans-unit.target: Data/hora formatos seguem a sintaxe da especificação do "Data de W3C e formatos de hora" em [http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html](http://www.w3.org/TR/Note-datetime.html).

trans-unit.source: The components shown below must be present and use the syntax and punctuation as defined.
trans-unit.target: Os componentes mostrados abaixo devem estar presente e use a sintaxe e pontuação conforme definido.

trans-unit.source: |TimeFormat|Description|Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYY|Year|2005| |YYYY-MM|Year and month|2005-07| |YYYY-MM-DD|Complete date|2005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| where: ||| |-|-| |YYYY|four-digit year (for example 2005)| |MM|two-digit month (01=January)| |DD|two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |Thh|two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mm|two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ss|two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |s|one or more digits representing a decimal fracion of a second| |TZD|time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|
trans-unit.target: | TimeFormat | Descrição | Exemplo | |----------------|-----------------|-------------| | AAAA | Ano | 2005 | | AAAA-MM | Ano e mês | 2005-07 | | AAAA-MM-DD | Data de conclusão | 2005-07-28 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mmTZD | Concluir a data mais horas e minutos | 2005-07-28T19:20-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD | Concluir a data mais horas, minutos e segundos | 2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD| Concluir a data mais horas, minutos e segundos com uma fração decimal | 2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00 | onde: | | | |-|-| | AAAA | ano de quatro dígitos (por exemplo, 2005) | | MM | mês de dois dígitos (01 = janeiro) | | DD | dia de dois dígitos do mês (01 a 31) | | Thh | hora de dois dígitos (de 00 a 23, 24 horas) | | mm | dois dígitos de minutos (de 00 a 59) | | ss | dois dígitos de segundos (de 00 a 59) | | s | um ou mais dígitos que representa um decimal fracion de um segundo | | TZD | designador de fuso horário (Z ou + hh: mm ou - hh: mm) |

trans-unit.source: The date/time format used to create a signature <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>.
trans-unit.target: O formato de data/hora usado para criar uma assinatura <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains each defined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType*> and its associated [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.Algorithm*> identifier.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário que contém cada definido <> </> *> e seus associados [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref>.<> </> *> identificador.

trans-unit.source: During a sign operation the associated transform algorithm for each content type is applied before the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A> is executed.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma operação de entrada, o algoritmo de transformação associada para cada tipo de conteúdo é aplicado antes do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>é executado.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.HashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default content and transform mappings include: |Content|ContentType|Transform algorithm identifier| |-------------|-----------------|------------------------------------| |Relationship|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.relationships+xml"|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl>| |Digital Signature|"application/vnd.openxmlformats-package.digital-signature-xmlsignature+xml"|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl>|
trans-unit.target: Mapeamentos de conteúdo e a transformação padrão incluem: | Conteúdo | ContentType | Identificador de algoritmo de transformação | |-------------|-----------------|------------------------------------| | Relação | " application/vnd.openxmlformats-Package.Relationships+XML"| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl>| | Assinatura digital | " application/vnd.openxmlformats-Package.Digital-Signature-xmlsignature+XML"| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl>|</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains each defined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType*> and its associated [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.Algorithm*> identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário que contém cada definido <> </> *> e seus associados [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref>.<> </> *> identificador.

trans-unit.source: Verifies a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifica um determinado certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to verify.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags"></xref> (value 0) if the certificate verified successfully; otherwise, a bitwise enumeration of error flags.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags"></xref>(valor 0) se o certificado é verificado com êxito; Caso contrário, uma enumeração de bit a bit de erro sinalizadores.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the signatures on all signed parts within the package.
trans-unit.target: Verifica as assinaturas em todas as partes assinadas dentro do pacote.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies only the digital signatures; it does not verify the related X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Este método verifica somente as assinaturas digitais; ele não verifica os certificados x.&509; relacionados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifyCertificate%2A> method can be used to verify the X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifyCertificate%2A>método pode ser usado para verificar os certificados x.&509;.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifyCertificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to exit on first failure; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to continue and check all signatures.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para sair na primeira falha; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para continuar e verificar todas as assinaturas.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> (value 0) if all signatures are verified successfully; otherwise, an enumeration that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>(valor 0) se todas as assinaturas são verificadas com êxito; Caso contrário, uma enumeração que identifica o erro.
